revised_title: Observations of Worms, Gnats, and Animalcula in Sheeps Livers and Excrements of Frogs
tldr: The author, Antony van Leeuwenhoek, observed and described various types of worms, gnats, and animalcula found in sheep livers and frog excrements. He discovered two types of gnats, one with and one without stings, and studied their life cycles. He also observed small, round particles in water that contained other particles and eventually gave birth to more particles, suggesting a form of reproduction.
